intro: Diplothemium, commonly known as the African daisy, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. Diplothemium species are known for their ability to thrive in dry conditions, making them drought-tolerant. They are also valued for their ornamental appeal in gardens and landscapes.
